title: Did Test Positive
author: DxmTripper
citation: DxmTripper. "Did Test Positive: experience with DXM & Drug Testing (ID 80578)". Erowid.org. Aug 23, 2009. erowid.org/exp/80578
footer: Age at time of experience: Not Given

[ View as PDF (for printing) ] [ View as LaTeX (for geeks) ]
[ Switch Colors ]
report:
My friend T and I took 710mg DXM each. After about 4 hours of tripping, T threw up. My mom found out, took us to the hospital, and the doctors drug tested me (without consent of course) six hours after ingesting DXM. I tested positive for marijuana, which I had smoked earlier. But I also tested positive for opiates and PCP.

Note: It was a urine and blood test.
